title: 'Well-preserved' 5,000-year-old dog buried with bone dagger unearthed in ancient bog
description: Archaeologists discovered an exceptionally well-preserved Stone Age dog skeleton buried with a 5,000-year-old bone dagger in a Swedish bog southwest of Stockholm.

title: In Brazil’s Costa Verde, local communities are tapping into the ancient stillness beneath their town’s thrum
description: Locals are retracing their ancestors' steps and highlighting previous struggles in one of the country's most spellbinding regions, Stephanie Rafanelli reveals

title: Long before the ancient Roman empire, a rival superpower looked set for supremacy
description: Before the Punic Wars, as Rome and Carthage edged towards conflict in the third century BC, the balance of power in the Mediterranean favoured the Carthaginians. But it was the upstart Romans who would be victorious

title: The Soul Of Tibet: Oriental Artisan Bridges Ancient Sacred Traditions With The Global Seeker
description: (MENAFN - EIN Presswire) EINPresswire/ -- In an era of mass-produced mindfulness and fleeting digital trends, the distinction between a mere accessory and a sacred ritual tool has become ...

title: An ancient forest in Ecuador is the last stand for a tiny hummingbird facing extinction
description: The Yanacocha Reserve in the Ecuadorian Andes is the last refuge for a tiny hummingbird facing extinction. The Black-breasted puffleg, emblematic of Quito, measures just 3.5 inches and is among the most threatened species globally. The International Union for Conservation...
